'''Bedrock Editor v1.0.0''', also known as the '''The Exiting Beta Update''', is the first full release for the [[Bedrock Editor]] released in Preview on May 27, 2025, and in retail on June 17, 2025.<ref>{{cite|url=https://github.com/Mojang/minecraft-editor/discussions/242|title=Release 1.0.0 (1.21.90.27): The Exiting Beta Update|website=GitHub|date=May 27, 2025}}</ref><ref>{{cite|url=https://github.com/Mojang/minecraft-editor/discussions/246|title=Editor v1.0.0 is now in retail via the Launcher!|website=GitHub|date=June 17, 2025}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
* The selection rendering bugs from [[Bedrock Editor 0.9.9.9]] have been addressed.
